title: Spring equinox 2017 Google doodle marks 1st day of spring in the Northern Hemisphere
text:
Today's animated doodle ushering in spring shows a mouse at work, completing its spring cleaning rituals. The post Spring equinox 2017 Google doodle marks 1st day of spring in the Northern Hemisphere appeared first on Search Engine Land.

Please visit Search Engine Land for the full article.
